                                                boolean createIfNecessary)
                                                         throws javax.microedition.rms.RecordStoreException
        Get a RecordStore. This method supports a global pool of open record stores and thereby avoids repeated opening and closing of record stores which are used several times.
        Parameters:

        createIfNecessary -
        Returns:
        null if the record store does not exist
